bibl.title: Simonides and Horace on the Death of Achilles. Translated by David SIDER.
bibl.note: Earlier versions of this paper appeared as: Simonide e Orazio sulla morte di Achille, ZPE 107 (1995) pp. 33-38; - Arethusa 29 (1996) pp. 247-253. - I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 11 was the model for Horace, Carm. IV, 6, 9-12.

bibl.title: The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire

bibl.seg: BARCHIESI Alessandro, Simonides and Horace on the Death of Achilles. Translated by David SIDER.
Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER (Edd.), The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire (Oxford, 2001) pp. 255-260.

Earlier versions of this paper appeared as: Simonide e Orazio sulla morte di Achille, ZPE 107 (1995) pp. 33-38; - Arethusa 29 (1996) pp. 247-253. - I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 11 was the model for Horace, Carm. IV, 6, 9-12.
